narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Horizons Mental Health Center, INC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Hutchinson, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $31.6M in Medicaid payments across 291K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $31.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
